summary:
As the scale of large, publicly-traded translation conglomerates grows, so too does the disconnect between those making business decisions and those translating, reviewing or post-editing the text.

While large publicly-traded translation companies continue to grow, there remains a close relationship between those making business decisions and those translating, reviewing or post-editing the text.

Large publicly-traded translation companies are reducing in size, which is closing the gap between those making business decisions and those translating, reviewing or post-editing the text.

Suggestions from the industry to automate project management or use block chain to attribute authorship are not likely to improve the disparity of power between employers and translators.

Suggestions from human translators to automate project management or use block chain to attribute authorship are not likely to improve the disparity of power between employers and translators.

Suggestions from the industry to automate project management or use block chain to attribute authorship are attempts to improve the disparity of power between employers and translators.

UN Sustainable Development Goal 8 is to provide decent work and economic growth, this is relevant to MT, along with SDGs 13 and 15, which are related to environmental sustainability. 

UN Sustainable Development Goal 8 is to provide decent work and economic growth, this is relevant to MT, SDGs 13 and 15, which are related to environmental sustainability, are not.

UN Sustainable Development Goals 8, 13 and 15 are all related to the provision of decent work and economic growth.

Strubell et al. (2019) estimate that training for one large transformer neural network model will produce almost five times the CO2 output of a car during its full lifetime.

Strubell et al. (2019) estimate that training for one large transformer neural network model will produce almost five times the CO2 output of an airplane during its full lifetime.

Strubell et al. (2019) estimate that training for one large transformer neural network model will produce almost three times the CO2 output of an airplane during its full lifetime.
